channel.title: James Whitehead on Computing Club
channel.description: Recent content in James Whitehead on Computing Club

item.title: Galton board code
item.description: The code for the Raspberry Pi Galton board simulation is now on github. It’s currently entirely David Grellscheid’s work so I don’t intend to make the repository public, but anyone who’d like to work on improving the code is welcome to do so – just send me an email with your github username and I’ll add you as a collaborator.
item.content: The code for the Raspberry Pi Galton board simulation is now on github. It’s currently entirely David Grellscheid’s work so I don’t intend to make the repository public, but anyone who’d like to work on improving the code is welcome to do so – just send me an email with your github username and I’ll add you as a collaborator.
